results.title: Pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic modelling of atenolol in rabbits maintained on continuous peritoneal dialysis.
results.text_hl: The nine-fold decrease of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ elimination in @<m>DISEASE_Anuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001002 @@@anuria@@@ was in good agreement with the increase in duration of the drug's effect, and was suitably described by the "effect model".

citations.NLM: Celardo A, Traina GL, Arboix M, Puigdemont A, Bonati M. Pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic modelling of atenolol in rabbits maintained on continuous peritoneal dialysis. Eur J Drug Metab Pharmacokinet. 1987 Jan-Mar;12(1):41-8. PMID: 3609072
